fieldData.title: Support to companies for hiring on the basis of teleworking contracts in interior regions
fieldData.title_nationalLanguage: Apoio à contratação em regime de teletrabalho/regiões do interior
fieldData.calc_minorCategory: Promoting the economic, labour market and social recovery
fieldData.calc_subMinorCategory: Active labour market policies, incl. subsidised job creation
fieldData.descriptionBackgroundInfo: The Resolution of the Council of Ministers no. 41/2020, of 6 June, that approved the Economic and Social Stabilisation Programme, established new measures to promote and extend teleworking (2.6), among which is the support to business in the interior regions with incidence on support to companies for hiring on the basis of teleworking contracts (2.6.2.1).
fieldData.descriptionContentOfMeasure: Within the scope of the +CO3SO Jobs Programme a new support to job creation was put in place supporting all the direct costs associated with the jobs created, namely the remuneration plus the respective contributory expenses borne by the employer, for a maximum period of 36 months. In addition to this support, the measure Working in the Interior Regions Programme (2.6.2)  provides additional support to coastal companies that create teleworking jobs in interior regions (2.6.2.1). Coastal companies will receive an amount equivalent to 0.5% of Social Support Index (SSI in 2020 = 438,81€), per job created, for each month of support, regardless of the number of jobs created, whenever teleworking jobs are created in interior regions.
fieldData.descriptionInvolvementOfSocialPartners: Social Partners were consulted at the Standing Committee for Social Concertation.
